text_126.en: Lists are continuous, vertical indexes of text or images. They are used to group together related pieces of data or informations to highlight association with each other and easy to read. They are frequently used for navigation as well as displaying general content.

text_129.en: Add a list to your app by calling the `addList` method of the `ui` object.

text_137.en: If `Icon` option is passed, the list must be of the form `[icon, title, body, secondary]`. To display an image avatar, passed and additional `Avatar` option and the list must be of the form `[image, title, body, secondary]`

text_138.en: If no `Icon` option is passed, the list is treated as `[title, body, secondary]` by default.

text_139.en: The secondary action is an icon button by default, to display as a text passed `secondarytext` option.

text_140.en: Adding a `selectable` list will disregard the `icon` option.

text_142.en: Here are the available setters and/or getters for the List Component.

text_203.en: Here are the following methods available on the List Component.

text_205.en: Adds an item in the list.

text_213.en: Adds a callback function when the list item is click.

text_217.en: Adds a callback handler for a long touch event. The touch timer is about 500 milliseconds.

text_221.en: Sets a callback handler when an item in the list is selected.

text_226.en: Sets a callback handler when an action icon is click.

text_229.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_234.en: Returns an array of indexes of the selected items.

text_237.en: Returns an array of titles of selected items

text_243.en: Make the list selectable or not.

text_247.en: Change the content of an item in a list.

text_255.en: Get the item in a list by its corresponding index.

text_260.en: Updates an item in the list.

text_268.en: Get the item in the list by its corresponding title.

text_273.en: Removes an element from the list.

text_277.en: Removes an item in the list by its title.

text_281.en: Removes the first item the list. This will return the item being removed.

text_284.en: Removes the last item in the list. This will return the item being removed.

text_287.en: Clears all selection in the list if the list is selectable.

text_290.en: Selects an item in the list by its index and marked the checkbox. List must be selectable.

text_294.en: Sets a new title text to a corresponding item in a list.

text_299.en: Sets a new secondary text to a corresponding item in a list.

text_304.en: Updates an icon in a list by its corresponding index.

text_309.en: Sets the corner radius of the list container.

text_317.en: Sets the padding of the list item. See `itemPadding` property for equivalent setter/getter property.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
